name: Kimcartoon Reborn
description: This style makes Kimcartoon less "stale" and boring. Most buttons and boxes now have rounded edges giving a sleeker look. Also, some of the colors on the site have been changed to be less stale.
additional_info: To use this style you need either the Stylish or Stylus extension. Stylish: (Chrome | Firefox) Stylus: (Chrome | Firefox) Then just click the big blue 'install style' button towards the top of the page.
